title: Ep. 43 - The Truth About The Masterpiece Cakeshop Case
description:
The Left is lying about the Masterpiece Cakeshop case. The Christian baker never "refused service" to gay people. He never discriminated against gay people. He never told gay people that they couldn't buy a cake. These are all lies. Let's discuss the actual truth of this case.
